mapper.insert: MERGE INTO GIVEVACATION G USING DUAL ON (GV_KEY = #{gvKey}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET GV_YEAR = #{gvYear}, GV_VACADATE = #{gvVacaDate}, GV_DATE = #{gvDate} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (GV_KEY, C_KEY_FK, GV_YEAR, GV_VACADATE, GV_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_VICEVACATION.NEXTVAL, #{cKeyFk}, #{gvYear}, #{gvVacaDate}, #{gvDate})
mapper.select: SELECT GV_KEY, C_KEY_FK, GV_YEAR, GV_VACADATE, TO_CHAR(GV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') GV_DATE FROM GIVEVACATION WHERE C_KEY_FK = #{cKeyFk}
